law.catch_line: Time limitation on billing -- Liability for unbilled service.
law.text: All service supplied by a utility shall be billed within two (2) years of the service. No customer shall be liable for unbilled service after two (2) years from the date of the service, unless the customer obtained the service through fraud, theft, or deception.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 143, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994.
